commit message: Update zxing-android-embedded with new custom activity
use Proxy.NO_PROXY instead of null value for no proxy
make use of proxies a Keyserver property
import: reduce number of threads a little, and code cleanup

import: make operation cancelable (again), make 'update all' cancelable

(also, use unbounded blocking queue to fix update of more than 10 keys)
changed KeyserverSyncAdapterService to work with START_REDELIVER_INTENT
keylist: add 'search for query' button to empty view

Merge pull request #1578 from open-keychain/keyserver-sync-fix

Reworked KeyserverSyncAdapterService
Fix API 23 regression for activities without layout, see http://stackoverflow.com/q/32169303
Add runtime permission check for QR Code activity
Properly hide fab in ViewKeyActivity, fixes #1580
bench: add benchmark operation for testing
bench: run ops multiple times and for an average time
bench: add simple s2k benchmark (iterations for 100ms)
import: apply fixPgpMessage to text for import from clipboard
Get whole public key via ACTION_GET_KEY
service: minor code cleanups in key retrieval
decrypt: skip unavailable and unsuitable keys
decrypt: add tests for skipping stripped and unsuitable decryption subkeys
openpgpservice: move stream closing into delegating method
decryptlist: some cleanup and streamlining of control flow
inputdataop: leave content as-is if no header found (fixes #1592)
decrypt: skip all encountered marker packets (fix #1582)
provider: add debug variable to explain query plans
some optimizations and indexes for the main key list query
allow database downgrade for debug builds
fix accidental commit (thought I had removed that)

Merge pull request #1564 from open-keychain/v/decrypt-key-lookup

key lookup improvements

Merge pull request #1591 from waffle-iron/master

waffle.io Badge (sure why not)
add documentation on marker packet skipping
fix delete file securely method and use for delete original file

Merge pull request #1543 from rohands/issue_mouseover_hints

mouseover hints
Check if NFC is available before displaying button
Request READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission for encryption of files (shared by file managers to OpenKeychain)
Handle denied storage permission, use ContentResolver.SCHEME_FILE constant
FileHelperLollipop: Check by comparing UID instead of checking files read permissions. This fixes sharing of file uris from sdcard
Request READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission on key import
Request contact permission in settings for contact linking
Show notification when READ_CONTACTS permission is denied in sync service, hide linked contact card if permission is denied
Update proguard workaround for support lib 23.1.1
Add first time wizard for sync settings
Disable contact sync by default on Android >= 6
No need to delete by raw contact id

Revert 'Add first time wizard for sync settings'

This reverts commit cd601988db41f7651f376ef419be3dd50aaa4e10.
